name: Complex Presentation Features
description: Tests the model's ability to create presentations with advanced PowerPoint features and complex structures

prompts.text: Create a complex quarterly business review presentation with multiple distinct sections. The presentation should include: 1) An executive summary section with a dashboard slide, 2) A financial section with multiple data visualizations, 3) A departmental performance section with subsections for each department, 4) A future outlook section with scenario planning, and 5) An appendix with detailed supporting data. Include section divider slides and a master table of contents with hyperlinks to each section.
expected_elements: Master table of contents with sections

prompts.text: Create a product launch presentation that incorporates advanced PowerPoint features. Include slides with: 1) A SmartArt process diagram, 2) A comparison table with conditional formatting, 3) A slide with animated build sequence suggestions for key points, 4) A slide with picture placeholders and formatting, 5) Custom slide layouts for different content types, and 6) Speaker notes with timing guidelines. Describe how each advanced feature should be implemented.

feature_utilization.description: Appropriate use of advanced PowerPoint features

navigation_design.description: Design of navigation in complex presentations

advanced_element_integration.description: Integration of advanced elements and features
